patterns: can you help me with something?
are you able to assist me?
responses: I will try my best to answer any of your questions :)
I am happy to assist you with any questions you may have!

patterns: can I set up an appointment?
I need to schedule something with my doctor
can you set up an appointment?
responses: Of course, I am happy to help! You will need to fill out the patient forms to create an appointment.
I think I can help you with that, you will need to fill out the patient forms to create an appointment.
Yes, let me assist you with this, you will need to fill out the patient forms to create an appointment.

patterns: when can I cancel my appointment?
responses: We need 2 hour notice before any cancellation to prevent a cancellation fee.

patterns: how much is the cancellation fee?
how much does it cost to cancel?
responses: Any cancellations that occur within 2 hours before the appoitment will result in a $25 fee.
Per the cancellation policy, cancellations can result in $25 fees.

patterns: how do I fill out the patient forms?
where do I go to fill out the forms?
where can I fill out the forms to set up an appointment?
where can I find forms to fill out?
can I fill out the patient forms?
responses: All patient forms can be completed in the appointment tab. To the best of your knowledge, please provide accurate information.

patterns: where can I find lab results?
can you give me my lab results?
responses: Lab results are typically emailed to the email address that is associated with your account. Additionally they can be found in the account page of the website.
All lab results are found within your account on the account page or they are sent to you email address that is associated with your account.

patterns: I need directions to your clinic.
responses: We are currently located at: 1234 East Earth Avenue, Colorado Springs, Colorado, 80920.
Our current location is: 1234 East Earth Avenue, Colorado Springs, Colorado, 80920.

patterns: where can I find a list of doctors?
I want to find a doctor for me
can I see a list of available doctors?
responses: All staff/doctor information can be found in the Meet the Team tab of the website
All staff and doctor related information can be found in the Meet the Team tab.

patterns: how do you manage covid cases?
how many covid cases do you currently have?
responses: Public safety is our top priority which is why we follow all CDC guidlines. For more information please visit the COVID information center on our main website.
The insurance providers that we accept are: Acme1, Acme2, and Acme3. Please visit our insurance page for more info.

patterns: can you give me a phone number to call?
i want to talk to a human.
I want to talk to a real person.
can you give me contact information?
responses: To talk to an employee you can dial +1(888)-123-FAKE or email at acme@clinic.com. For contact information regarding your doctor, please visit your account page.

patterns: where can I find my account balance?
where can I pay my bill?
where can I see my bills?
responses: Your account balance can be found in your account page under the billing tab.
For you current balance and payment methods please visit the billing tab in your account page.

patterns: I need to reset my password
responses: A password reset has been sent to the email address associated with your account.
I just sent a password reset link to your email address.

patterns: where can I find my account?
how do I find my patient account?
responses: Upon registration, all information relating to you can be found in the My Account page in the navigation menu.
